A block quote is used to render a quotation and optional footer element for the source attribution.

> The quote string must include proper localized quotation marks, e.g. `“”`.

## Style

Default styles will have the text align left but you have the option to center align the quote, right align the quote, add light weight styling or large text styling.

```html
<blockquote class="blockquote">
  <p class="blockquote-content">
    {quote}
  </p>
</blockquote>
```
Add the class `blockquote` to the container blockquote element which will wrap both the blockquote content and optional footer element.

| Class               | Required     | Description     |
|---------------------|--------------|-----------------|
| `blockquote`        | yes          | Applies styles. |

### Blockquote content
A wrapper for the blockquote content.

| Class               | Required     | Description     |
|---------------------|--------------|-----------------|
| `blockquote-content`| yes          | Applies alignment styling. |

### Blockquote footer
A wrapper for the optional footer element.

```html
<blockquote class="blockquote">
  ...
  <footer class="blockquote-footer">
    {source-text}
    <cite>{source-citation}</cite>
  </footer>
</blockquote>
```

| Class               | Required     | Description     |
|---------------------|--------------|-----------------|
| `blockquote-footer` | yes          | Applies styles for the blockquote footer.|

### Utility classes
Add the utility class below to the container blockquote element to apply styles.

| Class               | Required     | Description     |
|---------------------|--------------|-----------------|
| `light-weight`      | optional     | Applies alternate text styling. |
| `text-center`       | optional     | Aligns text to the center. Limit center aligned text to two lines. |
| `text-right`        | optional     | Aligns text to the right. Use with caution. May result in an inaccessible experience. |
| `large`             | optional     | Applies large text styling. |
